Happens on linux!!
add the following code to the editor

<?php
// phpBB 2.x auto-generated config file
// Do not change anything in this file!

$dbms = 'mysql';

$dbhost = 'quality';
$dbname = 'phpbb2';
$dbuser = 'phpbb2';
$dbpasswd = 'phpbb2';

$table_prefix = 'phpbb_';

define('PHPBB_INSTALLED', true);
?>

go to Outline view &  unchecked  Show Attributes 
an error is poping up saying: "error notifying a prefence change listener. 
check log.."
This error repeats in a loop sometimes twice and sometimes in an endless loop 
(need to restart appliction)
